What is the formula to calculate the total waste reduction achieved by a company implementing the waste reduction strategies outlined in the report generated through Swift? The waste reduction rate can be calculated using the formula:
Waste Reduction Rate = (Initial Waste - Final Waste) / Initial Waste * 100%
where Initial Waste is the amount of waste produced before implementing the strategies and Final Waste is the amount of waste produced after implementing the strategies. Can you provide sample Swift code to calculate the waste reduction rate for a company using the data provided in the case study section of the report?
